text: Sari Miriam Essayah (born 21 February 1967) is a Finnish retired racewalker and a politician. She has been a member of the Parliament of Finland since 2015. She is the president of the Finnish Christian Democrats party. She is the Minister of Agriculture and Forestry since 2023. She competed in the 1992 Summer Olympics and the 1996 Summer Olympics, coming in 4th and 16th place respectively. In 2016, Essayah became a member of the International Olympic Committee (IOC), and she has been a member of the Ethics Committee, Finnish Athletics Association since 2014. Essayah ran for President of Finland in the 2012 election, coming in last place. She is running again in the 2024 election. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Olympians for Finland Category:Finnish athletes Category:MEPs for Finland
title: Sari Essayah
